en-US.name: Knit Buddy
en-US.summary: A hands-free knitting row counter with project management and smart reminders.
en-US.description: Knit Buddy helps you track your knitting rows without putting down your needles. Say 'next row' to increment your counter, manage multiple projects by name, and set reminders for specific rows like decreases or color changes. Knit Buddy gives you a heads-up the row before so you're always prepared.
examplePhrases: Alexa, tell knit buddy next row
Alexa, ask knit buddy what row am I on

publishingInformation.testingInstructions: Create a project, increment rows, set reminders, and switch between projects.
